summary: Production-ready MVP fantasy sports mobile application named Skill11 Fantasy, similar to Dream11, focused on low-entry contests (₹10–₹100) for skill-based cricket fantasy platform starting with IPL matches
architectural_notes: Mobile-first application targeting both iOS and Android platforms
Low-entry contests only (₹10–₹100 range) to comply with skill-based gaming regulations
Focus on IPL cricket matches as initial sport offering
Payment gateway integration required for real-money transactions
Live scoring integration needed for real-time match updates
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Cricket-themed app logo with 'Skill11' branding in bold, modern font with cricket ball or bat element (skill11-logo.dim_256x256.png)
- Hero banner showing energetic cricket action scene with vibrant colors suitable for mobile landing screen (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
- Cricket stadium background illustration with subtle crowd and field for contest cards backdrop (stadium-bg.dim_800x600.png)
- Empty state illustration of cricket player with bat in ready stance for when no teams created yet (empty-team.dim_400x400.png)
- Trophy icon illustration in gold/yellow for winners and prizes (trophy-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Wallet/money icon illustration for balance and transactions section (wallet-icon.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Implement user registration and authentication system using Internet Identity integration allowing users to create accounts and securely log in to the platform
Create IPL match listing feature displaying upcoming and live IPL matches with match details (teams, venue, date/time) and real-time score updates

Build fantasy team creation interface allowing users to select 11 players (1-4 wicketkeepers, 3-6 batsmen, 1-4 all-rounders, 3-6 bowlers) from the two competing teams within a 100-credit budget, and designate a captain (2x points) and vice-captain (1.5x points)

Implement contest entry system displaying available low-entry contests (₹10–₹100 entry fees) for each match, showing prize pool, entry fee, total spots, and spots filled, allowing users to join contests with their created teams
Integrate payment gateway (Stripe) for users to add funds to their wallet, supporting deposits in ₹10–₹10,000 range with secure transaction processing

Create leaderboard interface showing real-time rankings of all teams in a contest sorted by fantasy points, displaying team name, rank, and total points, with final results declaring winners when match concludes
Implement wallet system for managing user balance, tracking deposits, contest entry deductions, and winnings credits, with transaction history viewable by users

Design a mobile-first, cohesive visual theme with vibrant sports-inspired colors (avoiding blue and purple), bold typography for headers and scores, clean card-based layouts for matches and contests, and energetic UI elements that convey excitement and competition throughout the application

new_feature_requests.summary: IPL match listing and live score integration
Fantasy team creation with player selection
Contest entry system for ₹10–₹100 entry fees
Payment gateway integration for contest entries
Scoring engine for fantasy points calculation
Wallet system for managing user balance and winnings

Build scoring engine that calculates fantasy points for each player based on cricket performance metrics (runs, wickets, catches, run-outs, strike rate, economy rate) and updates user team scores in real-time during live matches
